portfolioList.title: Dept. Veterans Affairs
portfolioList.about: This is one of a few applications/applets I helped to create and this is my latest work. The Scheduling Calendar View allows a VA Clerk to schedule appointments for Military Veterans as well as search for patients, patient information, schedules, messaging, and viewing pending requests. This application interacts with an old (dos-like) system that the VA still uses today.
portfolioList.used: Tools: Node, Marionette, Angular, Backbone, Handlebars, Underscore, Require, Modernizr, JQM, Twitter Bootstrap, Grunt.

portfolioList.title: Healthcare
portfolioList.about: Responsibilities include working in a fast-pace, agile environment, creating responsive web pages for all three sections of the Federally-Facilitated Marketplace. My work has been presented at the White House for the new health care law that was passed under President Barack Hussein Obama.
portfolioList.used: Tools: HTML5, CSS3, Twitter Bootstrap, dataTables.js, Javascript/jQuery

portfolioList.title: Medicare
portfolioList.about: Responsibilities include working in a fast-pace, agile environment, using asp.net to create HTML5/CSS3 pages.

portfolioList.title: Lucinda Team
portfolioList.about: Competing against 2 other companies, I was awarded the contract to develop a responsive website from Wordpress that the client could ultimately maintain. The goal was to create a responsive website that will work on mobile devices, that has SEO optimization.
portfolioList.used: Tools: Google Analytics, Search Engine Optimization, HTML5, CSS3, javascript/jQuery, Wordpress, PHP, MySQL

portfolioList.title: Eurasia Foundation
portfolioList.about: While working with DRT Inc., A colleague and I submited a bid for a contract to create a website that will inform those in Central Asia of their rights, as well as how to seek help in the event they have been wrongfully accused. This is a relatively small website that took about six weeks to complete, and used a search module that required back-end resources to search pdf documents and then result those reults on the site.
portfolioList.used: Tools: HTML4, CSS2, PHP, MySQL, AWS EC2 Servers, javascript/jQuery

portfolioList.title: SBA
